snippet: The $14 toll proposed by the administration of Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo for a new Tappan Zee Bridge is too high, the governor said on Friday.
abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo says the $14 toll proposed by his own administration for a new Tappan Zee Bridge is too high; tells the New York State Thruway Authority that he plans a task force to find ways to maximize federal support and lower the cost of borrowing with the goal of lowering the projected toll increase.
lead_paragraph: The $14 toll proposed by the administration of Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo for a new Tappan Zee Bridge is too high, the governor said on Friday.

headline.seo: Cuomo Opposes $14 Toll on New Tappan Zee
